page.description: Returns the number of objects contained by the object.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)
Form Controls (for <OBJECT> use the <CONTROL> pointer or the address of the control)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.CHILDREN() method returns the number of objects contained by the object.

section.title: Example
section.description: The script returns the number of objects contained by a form called Sales :
